ygData.subject: RE: New Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: NP. The gob headmaster is at the island where the oracle is. Go around the island (it is quite small) to the gob camp with the big stone Y pole. Headmaster
ygData.messageBody:
NP.

The gob headmaster is at the island where the oracle is. Go
around the island (it is quite small) to the gob camp with the
big stone "Y" pole.

Headmaster spawn in front of one of the huts. (There is a place
holder mob called headhunter that may spawn in his place.)

If you can solo GDB down in unrest, you should have no problem
there.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 21, 1999 10:53 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] New Quests
>
>
> From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>
>
> Thanks. Got the skull during lunch, so the only parts left
> now are the
> patch of shadow and the chipped mask. Might I ask where the goblin
> headmaster is in OOT, as it's a rather large zone.
>
> -Shadowwalker
>
> > I have the mask.
> >
> > You need to kill Greater DB. DB does not drop the skull,
> only GDB does.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, October 21, 1999 7:23 AM
> > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] New Quests
> >
> >
> > I just had a question. I have been working on the new
> quests (Acumen's
> Mask
> > at the moment) and I have killed about 15 darkbone
> skeletons and 1 greater
> > darkbone skeleton and still have not seen a darkbone skull.
> Has anyone
> else
> > gotten this loot item yet, and if so, do I just need to
> keep killing more
> > darkbones, more greater darkbones, or something special?
> >
> > -Shadowwalker
> >
> >
> >
